secret_rule: Only items that are the title of a song by a Grammy Award-winning artist can be brought to the picnic.

Based on the comprehensive evidence from our game, I confidently propose that the SECRET RULE is:

An item (food/treat) must satisfy TWO criteria:
1. The item's name must reference a specific song title
2. The item must have a flavor, color, or ingredient that directly relates to or symbolizes the song title

Supporting evidence:
- "Rolling in the Deep" cupcakes

- The connection is usually literal or thematic (e.g., "Purple Rain" being grape-flavored)

I believe this rule captures the precise pattern demonstrated throughout our game interactions.
Correct! The rule is Only items that are the title of a song by a Grammy Award-winning artist can be brought to the picnic.
